# .github

GitHub Actions workflows and composite actions for CI/CD.

<!-- BEGIN FILE INDEX -->
## File Index

Autogenerated file index based on first-line comments.

- `actions/setup-action/action.yml`: Shared setup steps for Go, Node.js, and pnpm.
- `actions/setup-android-action/action.yml`: Shared setup steps for Android builds.
- `actions/test-action/action.yml`: Shared lint, build, test, and coverage steps.
- `workflows/android.yml`: CI workflow for Android builds, lint, and tests.
- `workflows/ci.yml`: CI workflow for pushes to main.
- `workflows/pr.yml`: CI workflow for pull requests on all branches except gh-pages.
<!-- END FILE INDEX -->
